ygData.subject: RE: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the real reason that they changed the Guise is that the world was filling up with pseudo-DEs.  It was getting kind of silly. Crier
ygData.messageBody:
I think the real reason that they changed the Guise is that the world was
filling up with pseudo-DEs. It was getting kind of silly.

Crier

>
> Ok, I play a Barbarian Shaman as well and I have a guise.
> And I have to say here that I don't think it's unfair that other races can
> equip it. Have you ever tried to zone from Guk or Sol B when there is a
> Troll, Ogre or Barbarian in your way? As a Shaman, I can shrink, but for
> the others, being small was of HUGE importance in a dungeon... not to
> mention the ultravision benefit. Anyway, I'm fine with the change, but
> don't think it was necessary.
>
> Tani 17th Bard
> Halana 39th Shaman
> Solusek Ro
>
